About

Currently located in Boston (originally Charlotte, NC, then Virginia, then Colorado), this is my site focused on marketing, SEO, and inbound. I share research and case studies about: the best ways to optimize WordPress sites, audits of some hot start ups, how Neil Patel got penalized by Panda, why Wistia is dominating small business video hosting, etc.

Growth @helpscout // Previously SEO Manager. Currently focused on Growth Paid Acquisition (Social, Remarketing, PPC)
